title: Marketplace Tech for Wednesday, October 16, 2013
teaser: Alton Brown, chef and host of the Food Network's “Good Eats,” talks to Marketplace Tech about the cooking technologies he’s working on in his test kitchen, and the food tech we need to start 3-D printing quiches. Plus, a look at how the government uses data to track down the uninsured and get them signed up.
byline: Bruce Johnson, D Gorenstein and Nancy Marshall-Genzer
description: Alton Brown, chef and host of the Food Network's “Good Eats,” talks to Marketplace Tech about the cooking technologies he’s working on in his test kitchen, and the food tech we need to start 3-D printing quiches. Plus, a look at how the government uses data to track down the uninsured and get them signed up.
